^[{-} `r blogdown::shortcode("courseinfo")`] <span class="newthought">This site contains</span> the syllabus, schedule, and assignments for DSBA5122: Visual Analytics, held during Fall 2019 at University of North Carolina at Charlotte.

In this course you will:

1. Evaluate and critique visualization designs;

2. Learn visualization techniques & theory; 

3. Implement interactive data visualizations; 

4. Develop a substantial visualization project.
